item.title: Knitting and Sauvignon Blanc - Episode #577
item.dc:creator: tv@winelibrary.com (Winelibrary TV)
item.description:
Gary Vaynerchuk welcomes a guest to show us a little knitting action and he shows her a few Sauvignon Blancs from Chile, New Zealand and California. Having trouble viewing this video? Try the Quicktime version. Comments on this episode(110) Leave a comment ›
“good show! I like you doing wines we in NC can actually find. smile. [...]
item.content:encoded:
Gary Vaynerchuk welcomes a guest to show us a little knitting action and he shows her a few Sauvignon Blancs from Chile, New Zealand and California.

Having trouble viewing this video? Try the Quicktime version.

Comments on this episode(110) Leave a comment ›

  • “good show! I like you doing wines we in NC can actually find. smile. A…” by DAve A
  • “QOTD: I was trying to absorb the history of the moment.

    Happy Anni…” by Greg

  • View all 110 ›

Wines tasted in this episode:

2007 Glazebrook Sauvignon BlancNew Zealand Sauvignon Blanc
Simi Sauvignon BlancSonoma Sauvignon Blanc
2006 Vina Leyda Garuma Sauvignon BlancChilean Sauvignon Blanc

Links mentioned in today’s episode.

  • Lets Knit2gether

item.title: A Sparkling Wine From Spain and Portugal, South Africa & More. - Episode #576
item.dc:creator: tv@winelibrary.com (Winelibrary TV)
item.description:
Gary’s wines of choice these days are all over the place so Gary does another mixed bag to see what he comes up with! Having trouble viewing this video? Try the Quicktime version. Comments on this episode(115) Leave a comment ›
“QOTD: I’m watching this a bit late so I’ve already seen the Pats lose….” by David [...]
item.content:encoded:
Gary’s wines of choice these days are all over the place so Gary does another mixed bag to see what he comes up with!

Having trouble viewing this video? Try the Quicktime version.

Comments on this episode(115) Leave a comment ›

  • “QOTD: I’m watching this a bit late so I’ve already seen the Pats lose….” by David Dadekian
  • “QOTD: Unfortunately, I’m 2 days late… so I KNOW about your dirty Jet…” by YoungDave
  • View all 115 ›

Wines tasted in this episode:

Juve Y Camps Brut RoseSpanish Brut Rose
2005 Jardin Cabernet SauvignonSouth African Cabernet
2006 Quinta Do Vale Meao MeandroOther Portuguese Red Wine
2006 Herman Story Nuts And BoltsOther California Rhone Blends

Links mentioned in today’s episode.

  • Thanksgiving Secret Pack
  • The Thunder Cruise
  • If your interested in getting on the Herman Story Wines mailing list

item.description:
Gary Vaynerchuk tries 3 very interesting wines in a format he is far more accustomed to. The format you see today is reminiscent to the way Gary and many other wine buyers BUY wine for their establishments! Having trouble viewing this video? Try the Quicktime version. item.content:encoded:
Gary Vaynerchuk tries 3 very interesting wines in a format he is far more accustomed to. The format you see today is reminiscent to the way Gary and many other wine buyers BUY wine for their establishments!

Having trouble viewing this video? Try the Quicktime version.

Comments on this episode(178) Leave a comment ›

  • “QOTD: Have you ever been surfing? Would you like to go? Come out to…” by Kyle Suehiro
  • “Curious what stats you keep on all of the WLTV action?…” by T. Bone
  • View all 178 ›

Wines tasted in this episode:

2006 Albrecht Gewurztraminer ReserveAlsace Gewurztraminer
St. Cosme St James Little Basket PressOther Rhone Red Wine
2005 Potel-aviron Moulin A Vent VvCru Beaujolais

Links mentioned in today’s episode.

  • Thanksgiving Secret Pack
  • Link it up Mott T-Shirt

item.title: Time To Look At Serious Chardonnay After A Huge Win - Episode #574
item.dc:creator: tv@winelibrary.com (Winelibrary TV)
item.description:
The Jets romp the Rams and so Gary is excited and this is the perfect time for him to try some serious Chardonnay wines from California and see what he thinks! Having trouble viewing this video? Try the Quicktime version. Comments on this episode(133) Leave a comment ›
“My favorite Chard I had this year was a [...]
item.content:encoded:
The Jets romp the Rams and so Gary is excited and this is the perfect time for him to try some serious Chardonnay wines from California and see what he thinks!

Having trouble viewing this video? Try the Quicktime version.

Comments on this episode(133) Leave a comment ›

  • “My favorite Chard I had this year was a half bottle of the Jadot Batar…” by CraigG
  • “One of the best California chards for the money Cambria “Kathrines Vin…” by El Borracho
  • View all 133 ›

Wines tasted in this episode:

2006 Truchard ChardonnaySonoma Chardonnay
2005 Chasseur Russian River ChardonnaySonoma Chardonnay
2006 Sbragia Chardonnay Gamble RanchNapa Chardonnay

Links mentioned in today’s episode.

  • The Thunder Cruise

item.content:encoded:
Gary Vaynerchuk tastes 3 wines from the emerging Temecula region of Southern California.

Having trouble viewing this video? Try the Quicktime version.

Comments on this episode(136) Leave a comment ›

Wines tasted in this episode:

2007 Keyways Sauvignon Blanc
2005 Hart Family Meritage
2005 Thorton Estate Syrah

item.title: Screaming Eagle (Well, Almost) - Episode #572
item.dc:creator: tv@winelibrary.com (Winelibrary TV)
item.content:encoded:
Gary Vaynerchuk is humbled to taste some SERIOUS wines that are made for an amazing cause.

Having trouble viewing this video? Try the Quicktime version.

Comments on this episode(146) Leave a comment ›

  • “What a great cause and some good wines….thats awesome!@!!…” by Deano
  • “QOTD: 2005 Kamen Cabernet Sauvignon…” by Dave J.
  • View all 146 ›

Wines tasted in this episode:

Lookout Ridge 2005 Cathy Corison Cabernet Sauvignon
Lookout Ridge 2005 Marco DiGiulio Estate Cabernet Sauvignon
Lookout Ridge 2005 Andy Erickson Red

Links mentioned in today’s episode.

  • Wine for Wheels
  • Lookout Ridge Website
  • Wine for Wheels video

item.description:

“I went with my wife to Four Ways Restaurant in Bermuda. The [...]
item.content:encoded:
The video came out a little darker than usual, but we had a fabulous time tasting wines during Bacchanalia at the Napa Valley Grille in Paramus, NJ.

Having trouble viewing this video? Try the Quicktime version.

Comments on this episode(128) Leave a comment ›

  • “I went with my wife to Four Ways Restaurant in Bermuda. The veal was …” by CraigG
  • “QOTD: My new favorite restaurant is Ristorante San Daniele (Italian) …” by Heather
  • View all 128 ›

Wines tasted in this episode:

2007 Round Hill Oak Free Chardonnay
2006 Flora Spings Napa Chardonnay
2006 Trinchero Family Pinot Noir
2004 Twomey Cellars Merlot

Links mentioned in today’s episode.

  • The Napa Valley Grille in Paramus NJ

item.title: 2006 Chablis tasting, Chardonnay the way it should be? - Episode #569
item.dc:creator: tv@winelibrary.com (Winelibrary TV)
item.description:
The Chablis region is the northernmost wine district of the Burgundy region in France and today Gary Vaynerchuk puts these Chardonnay’s to the test, all of which come from the 2006 vintage. Having trouble viewing this video? Try the Quicktime version. Comments on this episode(179) Leave a comment ›
“I am drinking the Bouscat right now. [...]
item.content:encoded:
The Chablis region is the northernmost wine district of the Burgundy region in France and today Gary Vaynerchuk puts these Chardonnay’s to the test, all of which come from the 2006 vintage.

Having trouble viewing this video? Try the Quicktime version.

Comments on this episode(179) Leave a comment ›

  • “I am drinking the Bouscat right now. Pretty great stuff. Great pick …” by CraigG
  • “LOVE THE EDUCATION!!!!! Keep it up.

    Q - Lots of different wines, wh…” by wannaBconnoisseur

  • View all 179 ›

Wines tasted in this episode:

2006 Bernard Defaix Vaillons ChablisChablis
2006 Domaine Pinson Chablis ForetChablis
2006 Joseph Drouhin Vaudesir ChablisChablis

Links mentioned in today’s episode.

  • The Thunder Cruise
  • Secret Pack Taste Along
